languages.text: "Говоришь, эльдары сами виноваты в гибели мира-корабля?"

traits.locale_text: "Говоришь, эльдары сами виноваты в гибели мира-корабля?"

languages.text: "You say it was the Aeldari's fault the vessel perished?"
languages.original_text: "Говоришь, эльдары сами виноваты в гибели мира-корабля?"

traits.locale_text: "You say it was the Aeldari's fault the vessel perished?"
"You say it was the Aeldari's fault the vessel perished?"
"You say it was the Aeldari's fault the vessel perished?"
"You say it was the Aeldari's fault the vessel perished?"
"You say it was the Aeldari's fault the vessel perished?"

languages.text: “你是说，那艘船之所以会陨落，是艾达灵族的错？”
languages.original_text: "You say it was the Aeldari's fault the vessel perished?"

traits.locale_text: “你是说，那艘船之所以会陨落，是艾达灵族的错？”

languages.text: «¿Dice que la nave cayó por culpa de los Aeldari?».
languages.original_text: "You say it was the Aeldari's fault the vessel perished?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Dice que la nave cayó por culpa de los Aeldari?».

languages.text: 「船が滅びたのは、アエルダリのせいだと言いたいのか？」
languages.original_text: "You say it was the Aeldari's fault the vessel perished?"

traits.locale_text: 「船が滅びたのは、アエルダリのせいだと言いたいのか？」

languages.text: "Ihr sagt, es war Aeldaris Schuld, dass das Schiff verloren ging?"
languages.original_text: "You say it was the Aeldari's fault the vessel perished?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sagt, es war Aeldaris Schuld, dass das Schiff verloren ging?"

languages.text: « Vous dites que le vaisseau-monde a été détruit par la faute de votre propre peuple ? »
languages.original_text: "You say it was the Aeldari's fault the vessel perished?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous dites que le vaisseau-monde a été détruit par la faute de votre propre peuple ? »

languages.text: "Geminin yok olmasının Aeldarilerin suçu olduğunu mu söylüyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "You say it was the Aeldari's fault the vessel perished?"

traits.locale_text: "Geminin yok olmasının Aeldari'nin suçu olduğunu mu söylüyorsun?"
